player.name: Bill Laimbeer
player.physicalDescription: tall 6'11" center, gangly build, curly dark hair, smug villainous expression, white skin, the face you love to hate
player.archetype: The Villain, most hated player of his era, schemer and agitator

figure.name: Haman
figure.attribute: royal signet ring and gallows rope
figure.attributeDescription: the king's signet ring he used to seal death decrees, coiled rope representing the gallows he built
figure.visualStyle: Persian court official, schemer and villain of the Purim story
figure.clothing: elaborate Persian noble robes, rich purple and blue fabrics, golden chains of office, pointed Persian cap
figure.physicalDescription: tall thin figure, pointed beard in Persian style, scheming narrow eyes, arrogant sneer, pale olive skin, the look of a man plotting evil
figure.archetype: The Schemer, plotted genocide, hoisted by his own petard

connection.thematic: Both were villains everyone loved to hate, schemers who drew satisfaction from others' suffering
connection.narrative: Haman built gallows for his enemies. Laimbeer built a reputation the same way. Ultimate villains.
connection.relationship: Heel-turn specialists who embraced being the bad guy

interactions.description: Two villains standing smugly, enjoying their notoriety
Schemers watching for their next victim
